channel.title: Comments on: Episode #129: The Inherent Risks

item.title: By: Corey Petty
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/episode-129/#comment-351">Lane Miller</a>.
Successful! Thanks a lot man! Cello is going straight to buy that new mic! Crowdfunding at its finest.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Lane Miller.

Successful! Thanks a lot man! Cello is going straight to buy that new mic! Crowdfunding at its finest.

item.title: By: Lane Miller
item.dc:creator: Lane Miller
item.description: Thanks for the shout out! I just sent 645.79288 to your xrp account, and it was supposedly successful. Let me know if you got it. If not, I'll send a check in the mail:)
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the shout out! I just sent 645.79288 to your xrp account, and it was supposedly successful. Let me know if you got it. If not, I’ll send a check in the mail:)

item.title: By: Lane Miller
item.dc:creator: Lane Miller
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/episode-129/#comment-348">Corey Petty</a>.
Now I'm getting error 504 from Kraken. Can't buy, sell, send or withdraw.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Corey Petty.

Now I’m getting error 504 from Kraken. Can’t buy, sell, send or withdraw.

item.title: By: Lane Miller
item.dc:creator: Lane Miller
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/episode-129/#comment-348">Corey Petty</a>.
I will always listen! Thank you. Just spent 20 minuets trying to donate 645.81288 XRP to your account and got nothing but errors. It's 8:00 am, so I think Kraken is overloaded. Sometimes error 520, and sometimes 'this action is unavailable at this time'. Sorry, I tried!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Corey Petty.

I will always listen! Thank you. Just spent 20 minuets trying to donate 645.81288 XRP to your account and got nothing but errors. It’s 8:00 am, so I think Kraken is overloaded. Sometimes error 520, and sometimes ‘this action is unavailable at this time’. Sorry, I tried!

item.title: By: Corey Petty
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/episode-129/#comment-347">Lane Miller</a>.
Thank you for the feedback, we try to minimize noise but sometimes it just doesn't work out! Also, here's a Ripple address rMDQqbVJbaMWw7rsfpNwwT7vwDkahHRbBZ Hope you keep listening.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Lane Miller.

Thank you for the feedback, we try to minimize noise but sometimes it just doesn’t work out! Also, here’s a Ripple address rMDQqbVJbaMWw7rsfpNwwT7vwDkahHRbBZ Hope you keep listening.

item.title: By: Lane Miller
item.dc:creator: Lane Miller
item.description: Great episode, but I could barely hear it. I wish I could send Cello a thousand Ripple so he can get his clothes dryer fixed. However, I don't have a Swiss Army Wallet that will allow me to do so.
item.content:encoded: Great episode, but I could barely hear it. I wish I could send Cello a thousand Ripple so he can get his clothes dryer fixed. However, I don’t have a Swiss Army Wallet that will allow me to do so.
